Master Answer:
In 2009, children in BC would have been routinely offered the Diphtheria, Tetanus, Pertussis, Polio (DTaP-IPV) Vaccine at 4-6 years (school entry). Susceptible children would have also been offered the Chickenpox (Varicella) Vaccine. 
However, without a record of immunization, a person is considered unimmunized.  You can find information on locating immunization records here. 
- Immunization Nurse
Master Question: What was the routine vaccination schedule in 2009? I am trying to figure out which vaccines my son born in Jan 2004 would had just prior to starting kindergarten in 2009. Thanks.
